nodes.text: 84-SH was a timid pink-plated BB-series astromech droid in the service of the Resistance. It was stationed on the Raddus above the planet D'Qar shortly after the Battle of Starkiller Base, where it was repaired alongside other BB units. R0-GR would later include 84-SH in his book Droidography.

84-SH had an internal orbiculate motivator powered by a Selenium drive. On its body, it featured multiple cicular tool-bay disks, surface sensors and cooling vents for the motivator. Its head stayed on its body with the use of magnetic balancing. On its head it had a receiver antenna.
